column3: 2015| of raymond duke. raymond alan duke
column5: of syracuse passed away friday. born in syracuse
column6: he was genuine and well liked by everyone he met. he will be greatly missed. survivors: daughter
column13: karen duke of wood river junction
column20: and cousins. services: a prayer service and calling hour will from 10 a. m. to 11 a. m. friday at tindall funeral home
column21: 1921 w genesee street. burial will follow in greenlawn cemetery
